name: noice
helpComment: Twitch Noice bot made by Korpsian, make some Noice! Commands:

name: help
helpComment: use ![command] ? to get help with the Command. Commands:

name: ttsenabled
helpComment: Turn on TTS. Usage: !ttsenabled true/false

name: ttsvol
helpComment: Change TTS Volume (Value between 0 and 1. Usage: !ttsvol 0,5

name: ttsskip
helpComment: Skip current TTS readout. Usage: !ttsskip

name: ttsexecutionorder
helpComment: Adjust execution order u,b,c,n. Usage: !ttsexecutionorder ubc

name: ttsspeed
helpComment: Basic read speed of TTS. Value between 1 and 10. Usage: !ttsspeed 5

name: ttsmaxspeed
helpComment: Maximum TTS read speed. Value between 1 and 10. Usage: !ttsmaxspeed 8

name: ttstextlength
helpComment: Maximum chars to read. Usage: !ttstextlength 200

name: ttsspamthreshold
helpComment: Set Spam threshold. Usage: !ttsspamthreshold 5

name: ttsremoveemojis
helpComment: Allow ASCII emojis. Usage: !ttsremoveemojis true/false

name: ttsbadcharlist
helpComment: Set bad Chars. Usage: !ttsbadcharlist !'§$%&/()=?

name: ttsread
helpComment: Read out given Text. Usage: !ttsread Hello everybody!

name: ttsoutput
helpComment: Set TTS device ID. Usage: !ttsoutput 0

name: soundboardoutput
helpComment: Set Soundboard device ID. Usage: !soundboardoutput 0

name: notificationoutput
helpComment: Set Notification device ID. Usage: !notificationoutput 0

name: notificationvol
helpComment: Change notification volume. Value between 0 and 1. Usage: !notificationvol 0.5

name: play
helpComment: Play a soundeffect, name or ID. Usage: !play random/[SoundfileName]/[SoundfileID]

name: sbvol
helpComment: Change Soundboard volume. Value between 0 and 1. Usage: !sbvol 0,5

name: sbglobalcooldown
helpComment: Change the global cooldown of the Soundboard. Usage: !sbglobalcooldown 50

name: sbusercooldown
helpComment: Change the user cooldown of the Soundboard. Usage: !sbusercooldown 100

name: sbresponsecooldown
helpComment: Change the response cooldown of the Soundboard. Usage: !sbresponsecooldown 69

name: sbsoundinterval
helpComment: Change the sound interval cooldown of the Soundboard. Usage: !sbsoundinterval 10

name: sbsoundcooldownon
helpComment: Enable or Disable Soundbaord sound cooldown. Usage: !sbenablesoundcooldown true/false

name: sbreload
helpComment: Reload Soundboard. Usage: !sbreload

name: reloadsettings
helpComment: Reload All settings if changes where made in the configs. Usage: !reloadsettings
